HomePage.title: Create Your Perfect Resume
HomePage.subtitle: in Minutes
HomePage.description: Professional templates, easy customization, and AI-powered suggestions. Build a resume that gets you hired.

features.atsDesc: Ensure your resume passes applicant tracking systems.
features.aiDesc: Get professional writing suggestions and optimizations.
features.templatesDesc: Beautiful templates designed by recruitment experts.
features.realtimeDesc: What you see is what you get, edit instantly.

Dashboard.title: My Resumes
Dashboard.subtitle: Manage and create your professional resumes
Dashboard.noResumesDesc: Create your first resume and start your career journey

Common.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this resume? This action cannot be undone.

Auth.title: Sign in to your account
Auth.subtitle: Enter your email and password to sign in
Auth.signinHeroDesc: Sign in to continue creating beautiful resumes
Auth.signupHeroDesc: Create a free account and build professional resumes

Auth.agreeToTerms: By creating an account, you agree to our

Auth.resetFailed: Failed to send, please try again

Editor.resumeSavedDescription: Your new resume has been created.
Editor.autoSaveFailedDescription: Could not save your changes. Please check your connection.

Templates.title: Choose a template
Templates.subtitle: Pick a layout that matches your style and industry.
Templates.previewPlaceholder: Preview will appear here in the editor
Templates.standardDesc: Classic, ATS-friendly layout suitable for most roles.
Templates.modernDesc: Two-column layout with a bold sidebar and accent colors.
Templates.minimalDesc: Clean, typography-focused layout with lots of whitespace.

Settings.title: Settings
Settings.subtitle: Manage your account and preferences
Settings.avatarDesc: Upload a photo as your avatar
Settings.saveFailed: Failed to save, please try again
Settings.changePasswordDesc: Update your password regularly to keep your account secure
Settings.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
Settings.dangerZoneDesc: These actions are irreversible. Proceed with caution.
Settings.deleteAccountWarning: This will permanently delete your account and all data, including all resumes. This action cannot be undone.
Settings.languageSectionDesc: Switch the entire app between Chinese and English.
Settings.languageHint: Changes apply immediately, no refresh needed.
